content.description: This climb is okay.  It makes a good warmup if you're going to try Boone Saloon.  From the start holds, make a  few moves to get a huge left hand jug-sidepull and then reach up with your right hand to a high jug rail.  The rest is just an easy and sketchy top out.  Same start holds as Boone Saloon.
content.location: Left side of Borsmith Block.  Can be seen from inside Crinoid Cove.

content.description: This boulder climbs really well.  It is one of my favorites in the mad.  It's high in the air but the landing is nice and flat.  Be careful at the top, the climbing gets easy but  the rock quality gets questionable.  Same start as Social Distancing.
content.protection: A couple pads and maybe someone to help move them.
content.location: This boulder is on the left side of Borsmith Block (if facing the cliff line).  It can almost be seen from inside of Crinoid Cove.

content.description: Short section of wall separated from the cliff line by a chimney. There is a large overhanging section on the side facing the trail. The top can be accessed easily from the backside.  I dont know if this area had a name already but I just chose a random name so I could put some of the boulders online.  Let me know if it should be changed.
